description: Lightweight, short sleeve, slim fit baselayer made with Syncrino™ 125 fabric. Benefitting from both warm, wicking merino wool with anti-odour properties, and quick drying, synthetic fibres, it's the ideal first layer for multi-day mountain use
name: Rab Syncrino Base Tee - Mens

specs.value: 53% Polyester (32% recycled), 47% Merino Wool, Syncrino™ 125 Merino
